live_updates: Technicians will continue working to restore service and we will have an update later in the morning.
Our technicians are investigating and will repair services through the night. We apologize for the disruption and thank you for your patience.
57964.summary: Some customers in the Aldergrove area of Langley are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
57964.title: Feb 15 - Langley (Aldergrove) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
